body_html: Try setting CUDA_HOME to where your CUDA toolkit is installed (usually it's /usr/local/cuda, but apparently not in your case). Then, make sure the logs show -- Building with CUDA or something similar
body_text: Try setting CUDA_HOME to where your CUDA toolkit is installed (usually it's /usr/local/cuda, but apparently not in your case). Then, make sure the logs show -- Building with CUDA or something similar
body: Try setting `CUDA_HOME` to where your CUDA toolkit is installed (usually it's `/usr/local/cuda`, but apparently not in your case). Then, make sure the logs show `-- Building with CUDA` or something similar
